name: heartedness
content:

Add to word list
behaviour that shows someone has a character or feelings of the stated type: They told us of the wonderful warm-heartedness of Iran's people. Evidence of Magda's cold-heartedness is apparent everywhere. See
-hearted
More examplesFewer examplesHis warm-heartedness frequently wins people over to his side.He brings a nice edge to a character who could become boring in his good-heartedness.Sincerity and decent-heartedness has always been at the core of his projects.
